product_name: Design EssentialsAlmond & Avocado Curl Enhancing Mousse
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGive BackThe Design Essentials Natural Almond & Avocado Curl Enhancing Mousse is a must-have for all curl types. This lightweight non-greasy mousse formula dries quickly so you can say bye to frizz and hello to a stye with beautiful sheen.
details: DetailsItem 2594407How To UseShampoo and condition hair. Apply mousse to wet hair and comb or finger through into desired style. Allow hair to dry naturally or use a diffuser. (Mousse will disappear as it dries.) Proceed to lift and style as desired.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Decyl Glucoside, Polyquaternium-55, Cetrimonium Chloride, Polysorbate 20, Fragrance (Parfum), Cetrimonium Dimethicone PEG-8 Olivate/Succinate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, PEG-75 Lanolin, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, PEG-12 Dimethicone, Panthenol, Phenoxyethanol, Benzoic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glycereth-2 Cocoate, Citric Acid, Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Blue 1 (CI 42090).
how_to_use: Shampoo and condition hair. Apply mousse to wet hair and comb or finger through into desired style. Allow hair to dry naturally or use a diffuser. (Mousse will disappear as it dries.) Proceed to lift and style as desired.

reviews.headline: Amazing for curly/wavy hair
reviews.comments: Have been searching for a mousse that doesnt leave my hair flaky. Came accross this one on my searches. The price is not too bad since its a pretty big bottle. I always get compliments when I use this. I combine it with their wrap foam lotion and my curls last all day. Love it!!

reviews.headline: Curl definition without stiffness
reviews.comments: Recommended this by in store staff.  I really love this- it holds very well and can be reactivated the next day with water. It never makes my hair look stiff or dirty.  Hair stays soft and bouncy.

reviews.headline: amazing volume and definition!!
reviews.comments: I've been wanting to try this mousse for a while now and finally did. I can't believe I waited - the volume with this foam was amazing and the definition and hold were great! I've even used it on a dry refresh and it was so much better than other foams for refreshing. I will definitely keep this in my product rotation!

reviews.headline: One of the best I've tried
reviews.comments: Certaintly recomend

reviews.headline: Recommend
reviews.comments: Moisturizing, soft hold for healthy looking curls. Smells great.

reviews.headline: Definition!
reviews.comments: I always used to hear about this mouse and I finally bought it and I could not be happier with it. My curl pattern has lost shape throughout the years, it always looks frizzy and lifeless, I wasn't sure what to expect, especially when I didn't have time to diffuse this when I went out, I have not been able to have a good wash and go in years. My hair looks amazing!

reviews.headline: Leaves hair soft, smells nice.
reviews.comments: My hair is curly in back and straight in front. The mousse helps me to scrunch my hair without a blow dry on days I don't want to fuss. It was important it wasn't sticky or left my hair hard. It didn't and left it soft to the touch. The smell is nice.

reviews.headline: Allergic reaction
reviews.comments: I had an allergic reaction to this line. I normally love Design Essential and, no, Im not allergic to almonds nor avocados so, it has to be one of the chemicals.

reviews.headline: Great for low porosity 3B curls!
reviews.comments: Works the best of everything I've tried for my low porosity, fine, 3B curls! Doesnt take much. I section, use the mousse, add gel and squish. Thats all I need! After difusing i have bouncy, defined, long lasting curls. Give it a try! So happy I found this! Game changer for me!

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Lots of product for price and works great for definition and volume. smells delicious

reviews.headline: Almond & Avocado Curl Enhancing Mousse
reviews.comments: This curl mousse is graat. I have thick curly hair and it works wonders. I can go days with just this product in my hair after a wash. It smells good, the product doesn't flake, and the definition it gives my curls is phenomenal!

reviews.headline: Great for Protective Styling
reviews.comments: The first time I used this it didnt fare too well for a wash and go on a rainy day. Personally i think it may have been user error since this is my first mousse. Also mousse products do well if you have a dryer to sit under (I don't). I wanted to give up on the product but decided to repurpose as a protective style product. It's amazing for twist outs, keeps everything uniform and as long as I layer after a leave-in conditioner my hair stays moisturized for a week. The scent isn't too strong and the product didn't cause any contact irritation or acne like most products do to me. My hair is fine, medium density, mid-back length, medium to high porosity, and mixed patterned (3c to 4b). I have a sensitive scalp with dandruff issues.

reviews.headline: Will purchase again
reviews.comments: Granddaughter uses this line of products recommended by our stylist.

reviews.headline: My everyday "go to" product for great curls
reviews.comments: I have never found another curl mousse as good as this one. It is conditioning without adding any weight to my fine curly hair. I use it on soaking wet hair and comb or wet brush it through. I panic when I think what I would do if I couldn't get this product anymore.

reviews.headline: Very affective
reviews.comments: A  ample supply……

reviews.headline: Great for my hair
reviews.comments: I have 4C hair and was looking for something that adds moisture but is also lightweight. This is it! It doesn't leave any build up and provides the right amount of moisture without weighing down my hair. It kept my twist out looking good too.

reviews.headline: I love this brand!
reviews.comments: This mouse is 10/10! It has the perfect amount of hold for my curls.

reviews.headline: This is my go to product for taming my hair !
reviews.comments: My stylist at Ulta introduced me to this product that works for my hair!

reviews.headline: delightful new addition to my hair care
reviews.comments: i used to dread styling my hair. after i wash, i wrap my hair up in an old tshirt to soak up the water for 20 min or so. i remove, rake this through my (damp) hair and then diffuse. my hair is SOOOOO bouncy and gorgeous. I'm working out which products to pair it with to add stronger hold, but I do add a couple drops of oil for more moisture. The smell of this is not my favorite, but it's not unbearable.

reviews.headline: Boucny Curls
reviews.comments: I bought it based on an Ulta Hair Stylist's suggestion and love it! It's lightweight, not sticky and kept my curls in tact. I have low porosity 3A/3B curls.

media.headline: Finally used this as a wash and go styler
Finally used this as a wash and go styler
Finally used this as a wash and go styler
Finally used this as a wash and go styler

faceoff_positive.comments:
I have long type 4 high porosity coils and originally I used this product with the Camille Rose curl maker on top, and a different shampoo, and I got good pretty good day one results, but the moment my hair came around humidity it became sticky and all the definition disappeared. I love my botanical gels but they just don't seem to work great for me anymore, so I tried the three step method with the curls blueberry wash, camille conditioning custard, and just this mousse to style and I am wowed. My hair withstands humidity, if I don't manipulate it like crazy the day one definition lasts, it didn't take forever to dry and it was super easy to style. I just divide my damp hair (excess water squeezed out!) into 6 portions and apply liberally until most of my hair is defined and white, then I let it air dry. Also 0 flaking or stickiness!! Dried with a medium hold, my coils were soft but no crunch. Wish I could include photos. One section of my hair was a little dull and frizzy but that might be my own error.

Key to this working for me was basically a good shampoo and no other leave-in/styling product, and then a lotttt of mousse, like 7-10 pumps per section and then some.
faceoff_positive.headline: Took a few tries and the right shampoo/condish, type 4

faceoff_negative.comments:
While trying to transition to curly my stilylist recommended this product. At first it was good. I had a decent amount of volume, curl definition and shine. 
Then I started noticing my hair as a limp noodle constantly. My hair was also becoming more straw like. 
I live in Central Florida and was transitioning products a ton while getting my wavy hair routine down so I thought it was another product. 
Nope, I finally picked up the bottle to check the ingredients and bam, dimethicone. 
Why my stylist ever recommended this is beyond me. 
I do not recommend this product for wavies at all. 
Your hair will look beautiful at first but die a slow ignominious death. I've kicked this to the curb and found a better mousse that's more curly girl approved.
Now I'm fixing the damage that this product did.
Also, if you're a blonde or brunette this product will color bleach your hair in the sun or with heat. I'm still not sure why based on the ingredients but I'm a natural blonde and didn't have to use any of my go blonder spray when I was a hermit in the AC during the time I used this product.
faceoff_negative.headline: Dimethicone death
